text: nænxn di mi sayyan hnung prak d kæ phwk cea læw sung xyu nı sxng fay thi phechiyhna kan fay hnung txsu nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ læa xik fay hnung pen phu ptiseth sraththa sung hen khea hela nan dwy ta tnxeng pen sxng thea khxng phwk khea æ la xallxhˌ nan ca thrng snabsnun phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh dwy kar chwyhelux khxng phraxngkh thæcring nı sing thi klaw ma nan yxm pen khx teuxnsti kæ phu mid wng ta thanghlay
